posts.title: React-建置環境
posts.text: 建置環境 載入React, Babel 12345<script crossorigin src="https://unpkg.com/react@18/umd/react.development.js"></script><script crossorigin src="https://unpkg.com/react-dom@18/umd/react-dom.development.js"></script><script src="https://unpkg.com/babel-standalone@6/babel.min.js"></script> 加入 root 元素 1<div id="root"></div> React JSX 程式碼都寫在script text/babel 裡 123456789101112131415<script type="text/babel">//檢查資源有正確載入console.log(React, ReactDOM);//建立React 元件function App() { return <h1>成功建立React 元件</h1>; //因為有加入Babel 所以不需要加引號}//渲染元件到根元件上const el = document.getElementById("root");const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(el);root.render(<App />);</script>
